node.text:
By @robertedwardgrant Part I:  In a recent presentation I gave to world renowned Egyptologist and noted expert in heiroglyphics, Mohamed Ibrahim, I took him through the latest Da Vinci's masterpiece encryption, and world's most expensive piece of art: The Salvator Mundi.  While there is some controversy about the painting's authorship, I have unequivocal evidence that this painting was indeed by Da Vinci's hand.  Like the Vitruvian Man, this piece points us directly (AGAIN) toward the Rostau (Giza) Plateau, specifically the BOTH the Great Sphinx AND the Great Pyramid.  But, then again, this could all be an elaborate coincidence!! Mohamed has been with me on each of my adventures to Egypt, he was even there the night I discovered the AΩ on the Sarcophagus far rim on May 7, 2018. 

#therealdavincicode #TheCode-X #Egypt2021AχΩ #leonardodavinci #mathematics #encryption #decryption #codes #symbolism #alchemy #egypt #consciousness #light #pyramidcode

node.text:
"Divine Illumination" video by University of Science and Philosophy from Walter Russell. "All words read herein are from the various works of Walter and Lao Russell.  This unit explains Divine Illumination and Cosmic Consciousness both spiritually and scientifically.  Cosmic Conscious unfoldment is the great "self-work." It is a voluntary commitment and when widely sought and put into practice will help to usher in a real and true "civilization" of world brotherhood and sisterhood between all mankind.  Through the realization of what true oneness is scientifically and spiritually, many will begin to tap into their own cosmic consciousness which is man's next step in his crevolution.  The supreme mystics mentioned herein, are to give the example of what man can become through the knowledge and inspiration of the kingdom of heaven within himself.  We do not endorse or support any single religion or belief system.  We are simply stating that every man is as connected to the Creator as much as these supreme mystics of antiquity.  To the degree that you desire the light of illumination is to the degree you may express that power in your own creations and in your very being.  This is the spiritual light of mind which the "profane" may in no way approach or enter into.  Be pure of heart.  Seek, and you will find.  Knock, and the doors of perception shall open unto you.

Addendum: Walter and Lao Russell later changed their assertion that the pineal gland was the location for the Mind in "A New Concept of the Universe" & "Atomic Suicide?" in these statements about the heart being the location for the Mind."

#walterrussell #cosmicconsciousness #divineillumination #consciousness #one #unity #monad #unityconsciousness #connection #light #mentalism #lightisconsciousness #cosmology #love

node.text:
Gabriel Lyrio (creator of Light is Consciousness & co-creator of Fractal Science) and the polymath Robert Edward Grant @robertedwardgrant

This was my first appearance in my page (02/02/2020).

I am a researcher of philosophy, physics, cosmology, hermeticism, sacred geometry, alchemy, etc... On the other hand, the person who I am interviewing is one of the brightest minds I have ever seen, so I am honored to have this opportunity to work with him and to present his works to you!

Robert Edward Grant is an accomplished sculptor, artist, and musician. He additionally holds several patents and various intellectual property in the fields of DNA and phenotypic expression, human cybernetic implantology, biophotonics, and electromagnetism. He has multiple publications in unified mathematics and physics related to his discoveries of quasi-prime numbers (a new classification for prime numbers), the world’s first predictive algorithm determining infinite prime numbers, and a unification wave-based theory connecting and correlating fundamental mathematical constants such as Pi, Euler, Alpha, Gamma and Phi. 

Robert E. Grant is the Founder, Chairman, and Managing Partner of Strathspey Crown LLC, a growth equity holding company based in Newport Beach, CA with a broad portfolio of company and asset holdings spanning healthcare, clean energy, social media, and financial technology.

In addition, he is the Founder, Chairman and CEO of CONCIERGE KEY Health, the first on-demand service to the world's elite physician specialists. He is also the Founder and Vice Chairman of ALPHAEON Corporation (a subsidiary of Strathspey Crown Holdings LLC), a leader in the rapidly growing field of Lifestyle Healthcare and based in Irvine, CA. He served as the founding CEO of CONCIERGE KEY Health from April, 2017 until July, 2018. Likewise, he served as the founding CEO of ALPHAEON Corporation from February, 2013 until August 2016. 

He was formerly CEO and President of Bausch and Lomb Surgical in June of 2010. Prior to this, he led Allergan Medical as President from 2006 to 2010.

Watch the Full 1h Video on YouTube in our new channel!

#GabrielLyrio #RobertEdwardGrant #LIVE #LightIsConsciousness

Robert Edward Grant (@robertedwardgrant) is sharing what makes beautiful mind: any moment free from fear is an opportunity to taste immortality and new possibilities.

In the spirit of ideas worth spreading, TEDx is a program of local, self-organized events that bring people together to share a TED-like experience. At a TEDx event, TEDTalks video and live speakers combine to spark deep discussion and connection in a small group.

node.text:
"The top view of a magnetic field under a magnetic film (Ferrocell) reveals a 2D Toroidal geometry (orthogonal perspective) of a 3D Torus.

When viewed in 3D, it reveals a complete Torus.  Electromagnetic fields are toroidal in nature.  Within the electromagnetic field we can extract the regular 2D symbol / pattern from the closest sphere packing known as "Flower of Life".

The arrangement of metal spheres between two magnetic fields forms polygonal structures analogous to molecular and atomic geometry, presenting triangular, square, pentagonal, hexagonal symmetry, etc., until forming an omnitriangulated grid of regular two-dimensional packing of spheres (Flower of Life), and  Vector Equilibrium (Cuboctahedron), when 19 metal spheres are introduced.  By superimposing an image of the carbon molecule (nanographene) on the pattern formed by the magnetic arrangement of the metallic spheres (Flower of Life), we can see that it fits perfectly.

Carbon is the molecule of life.

This electromagnetic molecular bonding process does not only form carbon, but all molecules of matter.

The electromagnetic force is responsible for most of the interactions we see in our environment, as it keeps electrons in orbit around the atomic nucleus and allows molecular bonds to form visible matter.

When you draw the "Seed of Life" symbol (6-petal rosette) and multiply its circles in rotation, you can get the exact Toroidal Knot from the perspective above a magnetic pole." - Gabriel Lyrio
---
Top left video: Scene from the documentary "Primer Fields" by David LaPoint.
---
Top right video: "Brief demonstration of a square bar magnet under Ferrocell shows the same field of stacked magnets as seen in previous videos."  Brian Kerr video
---
Bottom left video "Hertz Donuts" by digitalrefuge
---
Bottom right video: 1/2 x 1/2 x 1 48 g neodymium magnet surrounded by 6 ferrocells located in a double ferrocell.

node.text:
By @robertedwardgrant Some time ago, I posted a picture of a Hexagonal Spiral as the precise  basis for the Whirlpool Galaxy, I further posited that all galaxies would eventually be found to conform precisely to simple polygonal spirals.  I believed that the right triangle IS the foundational basis of all spirals, which spiral pitch is defined by the Hypotenuse/Height of inherent right triangles found within all polygons.  I asked one of our summer interns @amanda.e.kennedy (UCF Aerospace Engineering Candidate) to research this thesis further with the intention of publishing a seminal Astrophysics paper proving this self-evident (Universal) relationship.  The underlying nature of mathematical Spirality has been the subject of much academic research over several years.  Normally broad adjustments are required to "titrate" the Natural Logarithm (Euler #) to explain why certain Galaxies possess certain Spirality and Pitch (characteristics), many theories related to speed of rotation and angular momentum have even been posited in the literature but none have demonstrated more than a corollary incidence and NONE has put forth a geometric proof demonstrating a determinable relationship.  Today was our first review of this groundbreaking internal research on Polygonal Geometries and their relationship (determinant correlation/ and even potentially demonstrating causality) to Galactic Spiral and Pitch......compared to the current academic research on this topic, this explanation is far more simple than the highly complex and barely comprehensible papers put forward as explanations for this natural phenomenon.  So far we have not found a single Galaxy that doesn't perfectly match a simple polygonal spiral, pointing to a much larger correlation to Gravity and the right triangular nature of spacetime itself.....(geometric) Scalar Waves (gravity) determining Transverse Waves (electromagnetism) and vice versa.  Lots of excitement around our Math and Physics Research activities at our offices lately.....

node.text:
The Eye of Horus was an ancient Egyptian mystery school which taught the occult science of the "Flower of Life", a universal blueprint of creation which leaves it's signature in all creation.

The Flower of Life encodes the language of the light of consciousness which generates all motion, forms, patterns, life and the universe.

Everything is light, and the Flower of Life is the eternal geometric matrix which composes all laws of physics and the harmonics of all manifestation.

This science explains that geometry is co-eternal with the Mind of God — the Light of Consciousness.

From this science, the pythagoreans, platonists and alchemists of the past understood the relationship between energy, frequency, form, animation, life and the entire cosmos.

The concept of "cosmos" explained by Pythagoras, which is the intrinsict subjacent order of the universe, is born from the cosmology of the Flower of Life, that explains how the light of consciousness is the one and only substance which is creating, transforming and evolving all matter and life in the universe.

Music by Ben Joseph Stewart. (Kymatica)

Excerpt from "El Ojo de Horus" (The Eye of Horus) documentary by egyptologist and mathematician R.A.Schwaller de Lubicz, dubbed in english by Gabriel Lyrio.

#TheFlowerOfLife #SacredGeometry #Egypt #EgyptianMisterySchools #TheEyeOfHorus #LightIsConsciousness #Cosmology #Form #Geometry #Physics #Consciousness #Symbolism #Universal #Knowledge

node.text:
Geometry of electromagnetic fields visualized through a magnetic lens. Post by @fractal.science

Orthogonal projection is a means of representing three-dimensional objects in two dimensions.

A brief demonstration using a bar magnet under a magnetic lens (Ferrocell), displays an orthogonal projection of the upper view of a Toroidal Pattern in Electromagnetic Fields.

This geometry surrounding the magnets is called "Torus" and is a ubiquitous pattern at all scales of matter, from atomic to astronomical, on planets and even galaxies. It is the source of the perpetual cycles and spirals of the universe, from micro to macro.

In this video, it is clear how Torus originates from the simple multiplication and rotation of the overlapping circles/spheres that form the Seed/Flower of Life.

We live in an electromagnetic universe, so the geometric patterns of electromagnetism are repeated in all dimensions of nature.

#FractalScience #Fractal #Torus #UniversalGeometry #FlowerOfLife #SeedOfLife #Toroid #Electromagnetism #Energy #Frequency #Vibration #Geometry #Physics #Science #Consciousness #Perception #Magnetism #Phi #FractalGeometry
#SacredGeometry #GeometriaSagrada #Vortex #Spiral #FineStructureConstant #AsAboveSoBelow #FundamentalForce

node.text:
Both the Sphinx in Egypt and the Fu Dogs which holds the Flower of Life below their paw (in China) are said to be guardians of the "sacred knowledge".

But why?

The hexagonal grid symbol of the "Flower of Life" that appears in Egypt and other places, encodes the geometry of space, but expressed in 2D as an orthogonal geometric projection (a static perspective or frame) derived from a 3D spatial-geometric system which embeds the mathematical constants of all fundamental forces of physics, expressing structures and dynamics based on harmonic motions that manifests a unified topological system of toroidal knots, polar roses, polygons, polyhedra, polytopes and matrices that encodes all geometries manifest in physics, chemistry and matter. This system was called by Buckminster Fuller as "Synergetics", and it describes the behavior and formation of matter through connected system of synergy, motion, balance, cycles, synchronization, self-assembly, geometry, fractals, transformation, energy, frequency, vibration, resonance, etc. It is the geometric matrix of physics in which all patterns in cymatics (vibration) and all atomic/fundamental force interactions are derived from.

The hexagonal grid motif was considered sacred because it reveals permanent and mathematically proven properties of spatial geometry such as the "closest packing of spheres" (which constitutes the architectural forms embedded in space, time, light, atoms, molecules, DNA)... It encodes the arrangement of the 5 regular polyhedra (Tetrahedron, Octahedron, Cube, Dodecahedron, Icosahedron) that forms the basis of the configuration of all atoms from the periodic table of elements. It is literally the basis of chemistry because it is a geometric matrix of vibration present in all phenomena such as light, electricity, magnetism, etc. 

This is a system that encodes the dimensional (and higher dimensional) properties of light: this is the fractal language of the universe which is based on spherical/toroidal harmonics.

The Flower of Life helps us to understand we live in a universe made of light harmonics and resonance — that Harmony is a physical and universal law of order and evolution.
~ Gabriel Lyrio

node.text:
The pinecone is universally revered as one of the purest naturally occurring forms of Sacred Geometry, its pattern being the flower's evolutionary precursor, having its spirals in a perfect Fibonacci Sequence, much like the geometry of a rose or a sunflower.
ㅤ
This ubiquitous formation in nature is a common type of phyllotaxis pattern, from the ancient Greek phýllon "leaf" and taxis "arrangement", which refers to the set of principles that govern the arrangement of leaves along the stem of plants.  But not only in the plant world, these same principles govern the configuration of cycles of harmonic vibrations at all scales of nature, including in our DNA and in the orbits of the planets.
ㅤ
The pinecone symbol is one of the most mysterious emblems found in ancient and modern art and architecture.
ㅤ
Few scholars realize this, but in different cultures the pinecone alludes to the highest degree of spiritual illumination, as well as the Lotus Flower and several other symbols that refers to the rotational symmetries of electromagnetism, which describes the natural forces of creation through the science of Light.
ㅤ
The Pinecone symbol can be found in the ruins of Indonesians, Babylonians, Egyptians, Persians, Greeks, Romans, Buddhists and Christians.  It also appears in the designs of esoteric traditions such as Freemasonry, Theosophy, Gnosticism and esoteric Christianity.
ㅤ
The pinecone has the same meaning for everyone: it symbolizes the science of light and its relationship with the mind and body through our vestigial organ, the "pineal gland" or "Third Eye", which represents the unified awareness that directs the evolutionary energy flow. The shape of the gland has a phyllotaxis pattern similar to that of the pinecone, hence its name Pineal Gland has its origin in the word "Pinecone".
ㅤ

By @robertedwardgrant Part I:  In a recent presentation I gave to world renowned Egyptologist and noted expert in heiroglyphics, Mohamed Ibrahim, I took him through the latest Da Vinci's masterpiece encryption, and world's most expensive piece of art: The Salvator Mundi.  While there is some controversy about the painting's authorship, I have unequivocal evidence that this painting was indeed by Da Vinci's hand.  Like the Vitruvian Man, this piece points us directly (AGAIN) toward the Rostau (Giza) Plateau, specifically the BOTH the Great Sphinx AND the Great Pyramid.  But, then again, this could all be an elaborate coincidence!! Mohamed has been with me on each of my adventures to Egypt, he was even there the night I discovered the AΩ on the Sarcophagus far rim on May 7, 2018. 

#therealdavincicode #TheCode-X #Egypt2021AχΩ #leonardodavinci #mathematics #encryption #decryption #codes #symbolism #alchemy #egypt #consciousness #light #pyramidcode

node.text:
Sound vibrations forming geometric patterns in sound resonance (Cymatics) experiment. #scienceismagic Vibration rearranges matter. This is the power of the influence of sound vibrations in matter.

Different frequencies creates different patterns. These patterns are repeatable, not random.

Cymatics has been called "Chladni Figures", they are shapes that appear on surfaces when they vibrate at certain frequencies.

Ernst Chladni (1756—1827), considered the founder of acoustics, discovered that when we vibrate a metal plate with an object, such as a stick or a violin bow, for example, it forms geometric shapes. When scattering grains of sand on the metal surface, it agitates over the plate, accumulating in some points (nodes), in which the plate is not vibrating. This accumulation produces the patterns observed in the video.

The plates have numerous possibilities for vibration, each corresponding to a specific frequency of the sound. Each vibration produces a unique pattern, and the complexity of the designs also increases with the vibration. In addition, depending on where the surface is affixed, its size, the material with which it is composed and its thickness, vibrations will occur at certain frequencies.

The nature of these phenomena leads us to inquire about the vibratory forces that act in the structuring of nature's processes and forms. We are led, by analogies, to visualize the world as a great interweaving of vibrations and harmonies, consonant and dissonant, structuring and dissolving the substances in cycles of chaos and order governed by an invisible geometric matrix of vibration.

❖ What are your thoughts on this?
▩ Tag your friends who would love to see this post / content!

Scene from "Inner Worlds, Outer Worlds" by Dan Schmidt.

#resonance #cymatics #science #sound #acoustic #waveforms #vibration #harmonics #sacredgeometry #oscillation #waves #frequency #patterns #awesome #amazing #spectroscopy #physics #waveform #innerworldsouterworlds #geometry

node.text:
"Divine Illumination" video by University of Science and Philosophy from Walter Russell. "All words read herein are from the various works of Walter and Lao Russell.  This unit explains Divine Illumination and Cosmic Consciousness both spiritually and scientifically.  Cosmic Conscious unfoldment is the great "self-work." It is a voluntary commitment and when widely sought and put into practice will help to usher in a real and true "civilization" of world brotherhood and sisterhood between all mankind.  Through the realization of what true oneness is scientifically and spiritually, many will begin to tap into their own cosmic consciousness which is man's next step in his crevolution.  The supreme mystics mentioned herein, are to give the example of what man can become through the knowledge and inspiration of the kingdom of heaven within himself.  We do not endorse or support any single religion or belief system.  We are simply stating that every man is as connected to the Creator as much as these supreme mystics of antiquity.  To the degree that you desire the light of illumination is to the degree you may express that power in your own creations and in your very being.  This is the spiritual light of mind which the "profane" may in no way approach or enter into.  Be pure of heart.  Seek, and you will find.  Knock, and the doors of perception shall open unto you.

Addendum: Walter and Lao Russell later changed their assertion that the pineal gland was the location for the Mind in "A New Concept of the Universe" & "Atomic Suicide?" in these statements about the heart being the location for the Mind."

#walterrussell #cosmicconsciousness #divineillumination #consciousness #one #unity #monad #unityconsciousness #connection #light #mentalism #lightisconsciousness #cosmology #love

node.text:
'Super-strong neodymium magnets' series by the 'Magnet Expert' channel — witness the devastating effects as two huge neodymium magnets are allowed to slam together with the equivalent force of 300kg of weight traveling at 200mph, and also how they can levitate objects such as humans.

This video is intended to demonstrate the incredible power of neodymium magnets and what they can do.

DO NOT TRY THIS AT HOME!

Magnetism is the fundamental force of the universe which composes the dynamics and forms in matter — both physics and chemistry could not exist without it.

Attraction, repulsion, cycles, animation, formation, transformation and all things in the universe relates to the fundamental force of magnetism.

The science of electromagnetism allows us to create many types of energy generating machines and all applications in digital technologies.

Electromagnetism is a revolutionary phenomenon that is ever present throughout the universe. We live in a electromagnetic universe.

"The day when we shall know exactly what "electricity" is, will chronicle an event probably greater, more important than any other recorded in the history of the human race." ~Nikola Tesla, On Light and Other High Frequency (1893).

▪️What are your thoughts about this?

#neodymiummagnet #magnetism #physics #fundamentalforce #force #attraction #repulsion #magneticforce #electromagnetism #torus #toroidal #geometry #floweroflife #cohesion #technology #magneticuniverse #cosmos #cosmology #electricuniverse
